forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 46F. SSW winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 41F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
